lead_paragraph: Defending champion Novak Djokovic returns to Rod Laver Arena for clash against Gilles Simon on Sunday as he looks to seal his place in the quarter-finals of the Australian Open for the ninth year in a row.
snippet: Defending champion Novak Djokovic returns to Rod Laver Arena for clash against Gilles Simon on Sunday as he looks to seal his place in the quarter-finals of the Australian Open for the ninth year in a row....

headline.main: Djokovic Back on Rod Laver Arena for Simon Challenge
headline.print_headline: Djokovic Back on Rod Laver Arena for Simon Challenge
